name: astroluma
description: Astroluma is a personal dashboard that helps users manage tasks, routines, and notes in one place. It features activity tracking, dark mode, and is designed to be self-hosted for full data privacy.
features: Personal Dashboard: Manage tasks, routines, and notes in one unified place. Central command center.
Activity Tracking: Monitor your daily activities and habits. Build better routines.
Dark Mode: Comfortable viewing in any lighting condition. Easy on the eyes.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep your personal data on your own server. Complete privacy.
Clean Interface: Minimalist design focused on productivity. No distractions.
Customizable: Tailor the dashboard to your personal workflow. Make it yours.
